page.title: 04Superstore - Asda
page.content: {Asda superstore}was built in 1978. It is a warehouse type of building about 30 feet high and covering one acre. The building is of dark red brick and is surrounded by a huge car park. The red brick blends in well with the surrounding housing estates. The main store sells both food stuffs and durable goods (Records, electrical appliances and clothing.) Alongside the shopping precinct is a building society, a pharmecutical chemist, video rental shop, furniture store, restaurant and haridressers. At the entrance is a petrol filling station. There is also a district{Health Centre with doctors, health visitors and chiropodists. The super store is used by people from all over{South Bristol. }
